oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bill Monroe at the Appomattox High School Auditorium (red)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bluegrass music; Grand Ole Opry (radio program); Metal photoplates; Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (red on white) announcing the Grand Ole Opry performance of Bill Monroe, the father of bluegrass music, and His Bluegrass Boys with George Winn and The Bluegrass Partners at the Appomattox High School Auditorium on April 25. Poster features a metal photoplate of Bill Monroe.
